Windlord/Trinity::

Windlord had left Grounded inside a cr and trinity Would have there 
until Grounded left the place. Trinity was happy to help and she 
promised that she would be there.

Windlord went to Conference Room, and sat down in front of 
Terrataur. "Well"said at last the male with a kind tone "I'm Windlord 
and I'm member of chivtrons; who're you and what's your faction?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Terrataur/Pyrotaur/Aquataur::
>        She nods and opens a com to Pyrotaur and Aquataur.  "Come to 
the 
> conference room...  You don't know where that is do you...  Just 
track my com 
> signal and meet me there."
> 
>        Pyrotaur and Aquataur get up from wherever they are and go 
toward the 
> conference room.
